title: Gold Support (Ex plat) looking for duo/ team/ whatever
body:
Just looking for people to play with in ranked. 
**I play** 
 Thresh
 Naut
 Janna
 Morg
 Sona
  Ali
  Blitzcrank
  Braum

replies.body: Hey dude. I was plat 3 last season then decayed out before rewards and looking to get there again...currently gold 3 play most ad's (favourite is twitch for solo queue)....Add me name is : Heircraft
